page.title: 07Family Life.
page.content:
{by Rachel Williams}
I live on a farm in{Yockleton}I have a brother and a sister.I go to school at Westbury.I have Saturdays and Sundays off. Sometimes I have a picnic on our lawn but only when it is sunny.I watch television when I come home or on Saturdays and Sundays (when I am not at school). On Wednesday nights I go to {brownies.}My favorite day of the week is Sunday because you can go to Church to learn about Jesus I like that. For breakfast I have cornflakes & toast, during the week I have dinner at school and I have salad for tea every night.
